content: The true power of Claude CoWork in marketing workflows is realized when it is connected with Claude Chat and Claude Code, rather than used in isolation.
To integrate Claude CoWork with other tools, connect Claude Chat, CoWork, and Code into your marketing workflow system, understanding when each tool is most appropriate.
Use Claude Project in conjunction with Claude CoWork to establish repeatable workflows, such as creating a strategy deck.
Automate ad creative pipelines using Claude CoWork, potentially integrating with tools like MCP (Multi-Channel Platform).
Leverage Claude CoWork for research analysis to generate deliverables, specifically for growth research.
Perform browser-based tasks, such as live landing page audits, using Claude CoWork with custom skills.
Package workflows into custom skills within Claude CoWork for tasks like AI search result tracking.
Utilize both official and custom marketing plugins with Claude CoWork to enhance functionality.

To install the Nano Banana MCP Server for Claude CoWork, use the 'Option 1: Using Published Server (Recommended)' method from the GitHub repository and paste the provided configuration into claude_desktop_config.json, including your Gemini API key.
